text: Patrick Joseph McGoohan (March 19, 1928 â€“ January 13, 2009) was an Irish- American actor, director, producer and screenwriter. He was known for his roles in Danger Man and The Prisoner. He won two Primetime Emmy Awards and a BAFTA. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Writers from New York City
